title: "Battleground Arizona" with Jim Sharpe
description: As the last few primaries make way for general elections to come, Republican voters in Arizona will find an entire slate of 2020 election deniers. Jim Sharpe, host of Arizona's Morning News on KTAR, joins Chuck with his insight on the Copper State's politics in 2022.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
